Welcome to the Coin Flipping Game!


There are 3 games to choose from :

  • One Coin Flip

    • The game will randomly flip one coin and display the output (heads | tails).

  • Multiple Coin Flips

    • The game will flip multiple coins and display the output (heads | tails).

  • Guess the Result

    • The game will generate a random flip, and you have to guess the result of the flip!


Please choose one of the games to play from the above.
